news.title: Revenue of Uttar Pradesh's urban development department up 33% in H1 FY25
news.para: Between Apr 1 and Sept 30 of 2023-24, UP's civic bodies collected Rs 1,054 crore as revenue. In the present year, the collection in the same period increased to Rs 1,401 crore.

news.title: Telangana government to develop 'future city' inspired by Incheon free economic zone
news.para: Launched in 2003, the IFEZ was designed to decongest Seoul and help increase economic activity and job creation through the establishment of industries and other facilities.

news.title: Bombay HC mulls timelines to decide on appeals of illegal constructions in Goa
news.para: Demolition is not the only solution to illegal constructions, but action needs to be taken to ensure they don’t arise, the division bench, said while hearing a suo motu petition regarding illegal constructions.

news.title: Bombay HC warns Cidco, MIDC, and NMMC for inaction on illegal constructions
news.para: If dissatisfied with compliance, HC may issue notice "requiring the respective officers, including chief executive officers, of these bodies" to appear in person and show cause why action under Contempt of Courts Act should not be taken against them.

news.title: Kerala government to table land pooling bill in next assembly session
news.para: It is part of implementing the land-pooling method in Thiruvananthapuram district, especially following increased investor interest due to the Vizhinjam Port-led industrialisation prospects in the port vicinity.

news.title: STF arrests man involved in Shine City scam in Lucknow
news.para: The accused, Rahul Sharma from Rae Bareli who carried a reward of Rs 50,000, was arrested in Gomtinagar. A driving licence, PAN card, ATM card and Rs 610 cash were recovered from him.

news.title: Andhra Pradesh govt to launch online grievance redressal cell for clearance of building plans
news.para: The move comes in the wake of alleged reluctance on the part of officials in clearing building plans despite submission of required documents by applicants.

news.title: I-T department conducts searches on four builder groups in Vadodara
news.para: Dozens of I-T teams carried out search operations at various places to ascertain if the builders evaded tax by not disclosing properties they bought.

news.title: Noida authority launches Rs 3,000 crore commercial plot scheme
news.para: Officials said these plots are designed for large-scale commercial projects and range in size from 17,645 sqm to 25,572 sqm. They have a Floor Area Ratio (FAR) of 4.5 and 45% ground coverage.

news.title: Greater Noida authority to hold e-auction for institutional and commercial plots
news.para: The scheme, launched by the Greater Noida Industrial Development Authority (GNIDA) in key areas such as KP-05, MU, Sector 10, ETA-02, KP-01, and Techzone-4, offers 13 institutional plots for bidding, with applications opening on Thursday.

news.title: Nuvoco Vistas Corporation reports net loss of Rs 85.17 crore in Q2 FY25
news.para: Nuvoco Vistas Corporation's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 2,279.01 crore in Q2 FY25, a dip of 11.63 per cent from Rs 2,578.92 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: AkzoNobel's revenue dips 3% to $2.88 billion in Q3 2024
news.para: "Our business in China is doing really well on the industrial side and it is doing pretty badly on the consumer side," finance chief Maarten de Vries said during a press call.

news.title: CMDA working on third master plan of Chennai
news.para: "Chennai has immense potential and will emerge as a top global city. We need policies that attract talent, create jobs in sectors like IT and research, and boost housing demand," said Anshul Mishra, member secretary of CMDA.

news.title: A deep dive on Maharashtra's new DCPR 2034 amendment
news.para: This change aims to streamline the development of Affordable Housing (AH) and Rehabilitation and Resettlement (R&R) tenements on private and non-government plots, providing developers with new incentives and opportunities. Here’s a deep dive into what this modification entails and how it impacts developers.

news.title: Call for urgent action on Delhi master plan 2041
news.para: MPD2041 is not merely a policy document but a vision plan by which Delhi will proceed to sustainable and inclusive growth over the next two decades.

news.title: Birla Corporation reports net loss of Rs 25.19 crore in Q2 FY25
news.para: Birla Corporation's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,969.78 crore in Q2 FY25, a dip of 14.79 per cent from Rs 2,311.74 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Godrej Properties posts net profit of Rs 333.79 crore in Q2 FY25
news.para: Godrej Properties' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,346.54 crore in Q2 FY25, a growth of 122.53 per cent from Rs 605.11 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Indian ceramic tiles industry faces export slowdown in FY25: ICRA
news.para: The demand slowdown from the USA is visible in the current fiscal, post the commencement of the USA Department of commerce’s investigations, in May 2024, on ceramic tile imports from India.

news.title: Tamil Nadu's DTCP appoints REPL to prepare GIS-based master plan for 12 urban local bodies
news.para: These 12 urban local bodies fall under package one and five. Package one comprises Theni Allinagaram, Valparai, Udhagamandalam, Cumbam, Bodinayakanur, and Mettupalayam. Package five comprises Edappadi, Udumalaipettai, Gobichettipalayam, Dharapuram, Mettur, and Pollachi.

news.title: Average rents across six office markets breach pre-pandemic levels in 2024: Report
news.para: The grade-A office space has seen a new all-time-high since 2022. Hyderabad and Pune achieved pre-pandemic rental levels in 2022 itself.
